title: Chrissy Teigen shares adorable video of John Legend and their son on the piano
text:
Chrissy Teigen posted an adorable video of her husband John Legend and their 1-year-old son Miles that is melting hearts across the internet.

In the video, the father-son duo perform a rendition of "My Favorite Things" on the piano -- with the Grammy Award-wining artist carrying the vocals for the performance.

Miles looks on at his father as he belts out the lyrics.

"Stop everything," Teigen captioned the video, which has already garnered over 3.5 million views on Instagram.

Several celebrities expressed how much they loved the performance in the comments.

"I can’t stop watching this," Vanessa Hudgens wrote.

"It’s VERY Sweet," Jessica Alba commented.

"Oh my flipping lord," Gwyneth Paltrow added.

Teigen also shared another video of Miles' "music class" with his father last week.

"Very picky music class student," she captioned the video.
description: Chrissy Teigen posted an adorable video of her husband John Legend and their one-year-old son Miles that is melting hearts across the Internet.
